abstract: Banks seem to be dispersing and shuttering their prop trading desks to comply with the Volcker Rule, but they’re really just continuing their gambling under another name, Michael Lewis writes.
snippet: Banks seem to be dispersing and shuttering their prop trading desks to comply with the Volcker Rule, but they’re really just continuing their gambling under another name, Michael Lewis writes.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is sending a nine-member proprietary team, its so-called principal strategies group, to Kohlberg Kravis Roberts. Bank of America laid off a third of its prop trading desk last month.  UBS’s prime brokerage is fielding inquiries from other banks’ traders looking for an exit so they can make the leap to their own hedge fund.

abstract: The bank said that reviews had found employees failed to adhere to procedures during a final step in its documentation processes.
snippet: The bank said that reviews had found employees failed to adhere to procedures during a final step in its documentation processes.
lead_paragraph: After several weeks of insisting its foreclosure processes were sound, Wells Fargo & Company said on Wednesday that it planned to correct and resubmit up to 55,000 improperly filed documents by mid-November.

headline.main: Wells Fargo to Amend About 55,000 Foreclosures
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo To Amend About 55,000 Foreclosures
